name: Tap Blast Block World
description:
Tap to Blasting, keep tapping to Win the Level!

Match the same colored blocks and try to get as much points as possible before running out of moves!

Each level has their own set of objectives that varies from clearing a certain % of tiles on the board, to achieving certain points with only limited moves. Tap on any block with at least 2 additional same colored tiles to remove it. Removing more than 6 tiles in one click will pop out a bonus tile that will clear big areas.

Features:
- Vivid and beautiful graphics
- More than 100+ fun levels

Have fun!
